alert.note: Alert for Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:56PM EDT until July 13 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Oneida County in central New York... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New York Mills, or over New Hartford, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Utica, Kirkland, Trenton, Deerfield, Whitesboro, New York Mills, Yorkville, Clinton, New Hartford and Oriskany. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
